data.title: SEO Agency Berkshire and London
data.meta_description: SEO services and packages from the SEO experts who know how to optimise your organic visibility to increase website visits, sales and leads.
data.text:
SEO Agency Windsor

SEO Services

We create sustainable SEO campaigns to ensure your web content ranks highly at every stage of the search journey your target audience takes.

journeys your target audience takes

Build brand awareness with key audiences

Drive highly targeted organic web traffic

Generate high quality leads and sales

Outrank your toughest competitors

Our SEO gets you seen

Business online is growing and each day brings more challenges for websites wanting to be found by their core audiences. As more competitors pile resource into their digital marketing, bagging the coveted top spots in organic search results becomes achievable only for those who can consistently meet Google’s ever changing technical, content and usability standards. Which is why SEO remains so important to any marketing mix.

Only by continual updates and improvements to ensure your website meets the 200+ ranking factors of Google, and the needs of your customers, will you attain success in the search results. We bring together our expertise in technical website SEO, high-quality user focused content and UX design, to make sure your website meets Google’s desire for quality so it’s visible at the time when customers you want are searching for a product or service like yours.

Our range of SEO services

From optimising your local business profile, to Google penalty recovery, speeding up slow pages, keyword research or optimising existing web content. We offer SEO consultancy, support for one off SEO projects or on-going monthly SEO packages delivered to meet the challenges you face.

Local SEO

Optimise your local business search listings to ensure consistency and quality over your Google My Business profile, local citations and business reviews.

Technical SEO

Make sure your core web vitals, schema mark up, site indexing and a whole host of other technical quality factors are up to search engine standards.

Website Migration

Protect your website from losing hard won SEO gains with a step by step migration process to minimise the risk of losing ranking.

Mobile SEO

Over 50% of web traffic comes from searches made on phones. Optimise your site to make sure you’re a visible and viable option in mobile search compared to your competition.

SEO strategy

A bespoke strategy based on research and data, with steps for how to achieve the optimisation goals you’ve set for your website.

SEO research

Discover useful insights and untapped opportunities with our in-depth competitor audits, backlink analysis, consumer profiling and keyword research.

Get in touch with details of your SEO project

Get in touch

Our SEO packages

Each SEO project is managed by a dedicated account manager based at our full-service Digital Agency in Windsor. Working in multi-skilled pods we carefully research, plan, implement and monitor your SEO project to ensure it achieves success for your website.

We can help with one-off project support and SEO consultancy as and when your in-house team needs additional support. We also offer monthly SEO packages that typically fall into three categories.

Light SEO package

Great for businesses new to SEO who want to get started. Also suitable for niche markets with low competition.

Standard SEO package

Suitable for businesses in a more competitive niche who offer an average number of products and services.

Intense SEO package

Custom-built SEO solutions for websites with high competition or lots of products or pages for optimisation.

Our SEO process

When you sign up for one of our packages you start receiving our support from the outset. After being assigned with your account manager, we work through the following process designed to build a strong, sustainable and successful programme of SEO activity.

Onboarding and goal setting

Our process starts with a meeting to get to know you and your SEO goals. We’ll run through things like what you want to achieve through SEO. Whether you’ve had any SEO done in the past (successes and challenges). Benchmarks of current performance. Who are your customers, where are they, what do they want to do and why would they choose you. Who do you perceive as your online competition, and a host of other questions.

Getting under the skin of your business and your SEO ambitions is crucial in informing what we do next.

SEO research and technical website audit

Next step is to do our homework.

Through using best in class SEO tools like Moz, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, SEMRush, GA4, Page Speed Insights, Search Console and more, we perform the essential research of:

A technical website audit to discover issues holding your website back from performing well in organic search.

Keyword research to find the topics and phrases customers are using to find and find out about the services and products you offer.

For competitive niches or businesses with complex requirements we also recommend:

Competitor analysis to uncover missed opportunities and where you might be falling short in competing effectively in organic search.

Consumer profiling (personas) to find out how they behave, the journeys they take and what motivates them in performing a search for a business like yours.

Custom-built SEO plan

Using the findings of our research, coupled with our SEO knowledge and experience we create a plan of recommended actions for optimising your website in organic search results.

Within this plan we highlight:

Priority actions for fixing significant technical errors or penalty notices given by Google.

Ongoing actions for incorporation into monthly SEO activity.

Resource required both by us and your in-house team. For example, if new content is required who is responsible for researching, writing and optimising this.

Current performance benchmarks.

An outline of your SEO goals and performance measures we’ll be using. As well as details of any new tracking that needs setting up.

We’ll run through our report and recommendations with you to provide opportunity for input, refinement and agreement prior to moving onto executing the plan.

Monthly SEO

On agreement of the plan, we move onto implementation where each month we execute a mix of the following typical SEO activity.

The exact mix will depend on your goals as well as findings from our ongoing performance monitoring. It’s good to allow for a little flexibility with this, so new errors or changes due to an algorithm update can be dealt with swiftly.

Technical SEO to optimise or fix such things as Schema, page speed, use of site tags, navigation structure, canonical links, page redirection, broken links etc.

Content creation and/or optimisation geared towards satisfying the searches your core consumers make at each stage of the sales funnel. While also satisfying Google’s E-E-A-T or YMYL quality standards.

On-page SEO to optimise onsite elements such as page titles, headings, internal links, meta descriptions etc.

Offsite SEO to build authoritative links, citations and reviews to your website from relevant, trustworthy and high-quality sources.

Monitoring and reporting

SEO is an ongoing activity which takes time to find its feet. Our aim is to generate incremental improvements that over time build into sustainable search engine advantages, and success for your business.

From the start of any campaign we measure and report on what we do and how things are performing.

We speak with you regularly to run through performance, discuss ideas and answer questions.

Our regular calls or meetings also allow us to keep up to date with any changes to your business, your market and your customers so our SEO plans remains aligned with your goals and ambitions.

Stay in the know

Sign up for our monthly e-newsletter packed with helpful insights and tips on how to improve your website and optimise your online marketing.

You can unsubscribe at any time by following the instructions in each email.

SEO (Search Engine Optimisation)
